Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees are coming off a 10-4 loss to the Royals in the opener, but the Royals took a 5-0 shutout victory on Tuesday with Seth Lugo going 7.0 innings with three hits and 10 Ks.
Luis Gil will start for the Yankees on Wednesday, with a 13-6 record and 3.24 ERA this season.
Cole Ragans will start for the Royals on Wednesday, with a 11-9 record and 3.39 ERA this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Six of the Yankees' last seven games as home favorites have gone OVER the total runs line.
Five of the Royals' last six games have gone UNDER the total run line.
The Royals took a sweep against the Minnesota Twins in their last series, with wins 5-0, 4-2, and 2-0.
Others: Andrew Jett recommends the Kansas City Royals +130.
The pick in this article is the opinion of the writer, not a PickDawgz site consensus.
